document_data.caption: A map showing the western end of Cymbril's Walk and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Cymbril's Walk
document_data.mainbody: '''Cymbril's Walk''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Cymbril's Walk was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road orignated on the [[Street of Bells]], branching west for several blocks through the [[Street of the Sword]] and [[Warrior's Way]] before turning north to merge with [[Alnether Street]] on the [[Street of Silver]] across from the eastern end of [[Keltarn Street]]. A small alley called [[the Prowl]] connected with the northern side of Cymbril's Walk and [[Elsambul's Lane]] connected with its eastern side.
